body.name: The Adventure Zone Boxed Set: Here There Be Gerblins, Murder on the Rockport Limited! and Petals to the Metal
editorialReviews: Editorial Reviews About the Author Clint McElroy is a 45-year veteran of broadcasting who now works on the popular podcast THE ADVENTURE ZONE, with his sons Justin, Travis and Griffin. He is one of the co-writers of THE ADVENTURE ZONE graphic novels, along with WAR OF THE REALMS: JOURNEY INTO MYSTERY, for Marvel Comics, and MARVEL TEAM-UP. He’s currently working on an animated The Adventure Zone TV show for NBC’s Peacock streaming service. He has three BEST DAD coffee mugs and six BEST GRANDPA...although the titles have been challenged.Meet the McElroys! Clint was born first, which recent studies have shown is the best procedure for fathers and sons. Justin came along twenty-five years later, two weeks late, actually, which caused his mother, Leslie, some consternation and more than a little back pain. Three years to the day (yes, the very day) Travis came along, forever ruining Justin’s birthday, at least according to Justin. The decision was made to not have a third child born on November 8th, so Griffin arrived three-and-a-half years later on April 17th. There followed this decade and that, during which there was a lot of school, theater, broadcasting, video games, moving around the country and various and sundry monkeyshines. Then came a time for fewer monkeyshines, so a ton of marriages happened and people were added to the family branch. In the midst of all this begetting, podcasts began springing up in even greater abundance and their names were My Brother My Brother and Me (which spawned a popular tv show), Sawbones, Shmanners, Wonderful, and a farcical romp called The Adventure Zone.Carey Pietsch is a cartoonist based out of Brooklyn, NY. Her work includes drawing two arcs of Lumberjanes and the artwork for the Mages of Mystralia webcomic. Carey also makes Keepsakes and other original comics about magic and empathy. Along with brightening her workdays, The Adventure Zone got her to join a D&D campaign, where she’s currently playing a dragonborn sorcerer who cares too much about romance novels.

body.description: This deluxe boxed set collects the first three volumes of the New York Times–bestselling Adventure Zone graphic novel series from the McElroy brothers―Here There Be Gerblins, Murder on the Rockport Limited! and Petals to the Metal―plus an exclusive poster! Join our hero-adjacent sort-of-comrades in arms Taako the elf wizard, Merle the dwarf cleric, and Magnus the human fighter on a grand and grandly hilarious adventure through gerblin-infested mountain lairs; a locked-room murder mystery on a speeding train; and a rollicking round of battlewagon racing, the world’s greatest high-stakes, low-legality sport. Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Condition/Beautiful Art
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been meaning to get the first three books for a while, so glad I could get them all together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I ordered!
reviews.reviewText: The box is super dope! It came quite fast, too. Love the artwork and how the podcasts first season has been adapted to graphic novel so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweet, sweet, good, good book series.
reviews.reviewText: Everything was perfect, even down to the smell of the books. Love supporting the mcelroy boys, and it was all well-made with care. The box was sturdy and all the books themselves were in great condition. Also the poster was a nice addition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars just what i needed!
reviews.reviewText: i gave my old taz book to my friend for her to start, and needed to catch up on the other books and this was perfect!! half the price than it would be to buy all three books separately and the poster looks so cool!!!! would definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love these so much! I’m reading them to my kiddo (editing out the few curse words as I go) and he loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t wait for the next to be released
reviews.reviewText: The art is absolutely gorgeous and the boys did a great job adapting the story from an audio medium to a visual one. My novels arrived in great condition, and I’m definitely happy with my purchase. Their delivery could’ve been a little faster, but ig with COVID it’s understandable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Box set of bonus
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my brother. He absolutely loves it. I'm a little jealous myself that I've been buying the books as they come out and he got a cool poster with the box set. Oh well haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love the podcast and the art and story in these books are very funny and entertaining.

Huge fan of the McElroys, these comic books were what got me hooked on The Adventure Zone, finished the set and had to dig into the podcast cause I just couldn't wait for the next book to come out.The only problem with box sets of books when the series isn't done, is when you buy more books later they don't fit in the box... Oh well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought it as a gift for myself and I absolutely love it. The art is beautiful and it comes with all three of the first graphic novels and saves you a lot of money on buying them individually. It’s such a delight to read and anyone even people who haven’t listened to the podcast will love it.

The artstyle is amazing and the characters are so lovable. Already ordered the Crystal kingdom novel and added a reminder on my calendar for when the next novels come out so i can see [redacted] my beloved
Bought the whole set. Thoroughly enjoyed all the books. Cute art. Great story. Cant wait for more books
Makes for an excellent gift for a fan of the show!
